image.alt: Glistening waters of the Venetian canals as gondolas glide by at sunset.
The powerful cascade of Victoria Falls, a natural wonder between Zambia and Zimbabwe.
Expansive view of the deep gorges and ridges of the Grand Canyon.
The historic Incan citadel of Machu Picchu illuminated by the morning sun.
The iconic Taj Mahal reflecting in its surrounding waters during sunrise.
Historic ruins standing tall against the backdrop of the Grecian sky.
Ancient Japanese temple surrounded by autumn foliage.
The sun setting behind snow-capped peaks of majestic mountains.
